name: on-object
description: Register many EventEmitter listeners at once using objects

scripts.test: standard index.js src/*.js test/*.js && nyc tape test/*.js | faucet && nyc report
scripts.test-browser: npm run build && ./test/browser.sh && npm run source
scripts.build: rm -rf lib && babel --presets es2015 src -d lib

author: Matt Bell <mappum@gmail.com>
